ef745c67-6523-4412-b935-888b59d870b1.description: In this course, participants learned to apply practical data analytics to efficiently identify specific agent improvement opportunities and root cause, implement the appropriate statistical tools with specific contact center guidelines and benchmarks, classify relationships between key output metrics, while identifying and eliminating process waste.
ef745c67-6523-4412-b935-888b59d870b1.name: ccSIGMA Yellow Belt Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Participants engaged in 3 days of training.
Participants were required to pass an exam with a minimum score of 85%.

de961d29-efb3-4f29-bece-fbfbf1987028.description: This training covers time management, discussing key metrics, best in class coaching methodology, and leverages a host of analytical approaches to uncover root cause. Each attendee creates a charter document that measures performance trends, metric correlations, and Pareto analysis to understand root cause with a set of quick hit, near-term and long-term actions to address performance.
de961d29-efb3-4f29-bece-fbfbf1987028.name: Insite's Frontline Leadership Training

badge_template_activities.title: Was actively involved in the training process
Completed their charter document and analysis

d08b2429-8eda-45f0-9417-4a64622c6f47.description: In this course, participants develop coaching skills that foster relationships through repetition and recognition based on an employee’s personality style to ensure messages are received and deliver performance improvement. Participants used Failure Mode Effect Analysis to recognize risks in processes and identify mitigation recommendations. Participants learned to calculate results aligning to the contact center’s specific financial elements and calculate an ROI for proposed solutions.
d08b2429-8eda-45f0-9417-4a64622c6f47.name: Insite ccSIGMA Green Belt Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Participants engaged in 3 days of training.

Throughout the training and weekly practice sessions, participants used the tools acquired during the training to complete interviews, shadowing, and analytics to identify defects and waste in processes and daily activities.
Participants were required to pass an exam with a minimum score of 85%.
Participants were required to create a project presentation and present it to the stakeholders.

skills.name: How To Identify And Communicate With Different Personality Types

bd8e0a84-59aa-4a83-b1bb-7eabae32b714.description: Earners of this badge demonstrated the highest levels of engagement while learning about how to leverage data to support coaching sessions and what coaching model would be most ideal for their audience. They participated in learning from contact center industry experts on best practices to understand techniques and pitfalls to avoid in the coaching process. During the course of 8 enablement sessions, the participant who holds this badge demonstrated a firm understanding of expectations.
bd8e0a84-59aa-4a83-b1bb-7eabae32b714.name: Coaching to Success

badge_template_activities.title: During each session, learners were required to demonstrate an understanding through practical application assignments in practice sessions that reinforced the desired skill.
At the conclusion of the session, each participant presented their key learnings and delivered action plans to a group of their peers and senior leaders.
In order to receive this badge, the participant had to attend 8 enablement sessions and actively participate.
Provided their own background and experiences in a safe and dynamic environment

6006377f-14ff-4872-8f4a-4af1d208e0f4.description: This badge is to signify the holder's completion of Insite's Facilitator Certification on Experiential Learning Delivery. badge_template_activities.title: Attendees will participate in a classroom session where they are provided examples of the Experiential Learning Delivery techniques and how to apply them.
